alert.note: Alert for Gonzales (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 05 at 11:26PM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Caldwell, southeastern Guadalupe and northern Gonzales Counties through 1215 AM CDT... At 1125 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles south of Kingsbury, or 13 miles southeast of Seguin, moving northeast at 30 mph. Another storm was located to the east from Palmetto State Park to Gonzales, also moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Gonzales, Luling, Waelder, Palmeto State Park, Delhi, Leesville, Oak Forest, Newtonville, Belmont, Little New York, Thompsonville, Ottine and Monthalia. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
